sentences.english: Add milk to produce a soft dropping consistency.
sentences.chinese: 至一种柔滑可滴的黏稠度。

sentences.english: Though its hands are silken, its heart is of iron.
sentences.chinese: 它的手虽柔滑，它的心却是铁打的。

sentences.english: Leaves your skin soft and silky from head to toe.
sentences.chinese: 从头到脚，使你的皮肤柔滑。

sentences.english: Ballantine's 12 Years Old ( Gold Seal), is a smooth and complex whisky.
sentences.chinese: 百龄坛12年是一款柔滑，复杂的威士忌。

sentences.english: Filled with semi-sweet and smooth creamy chocolate fudge.
sentences.chinese: 充满了半甜柔滑的巧克力糖浆。

sentences.english: Delicate silky powder is easy for you to make up, give you more average and vivid color.
sentences.chinese: 细腻柔滑的眼影粉质易于上色，令色彩更均匀生动。

sentences.english: Her skin is as smooth as oil, like the purest pearl.
sentences.chinese: 她的肌肤如凝脂般柔滑，像最纯净的珍珠。

sentences.english: Its lead is soft and smooth, easy to color, lines could last long.
sentences.chinese: 笔心柔滑流畅，易上色，线条持久，防水抗油。

sentences.english: The palate is soft and ripe with cherry and cranberry fruit.
sentences.chinese: 单宁柔滑纤细，有成熟的樱桃与酸果蔓的水果味道。

sentences.english: People often said his skin were like flower buds, white sand silky.
sentences.chinese: 人们常常说，他地皮肤像花蕾，白沙滩柔滑。

sentences.english: Full-bodied, with silky tannins and lots of currant and berry character.
sentences.chinese: 酒体浓郁，柔滑的单宁和丰富的红醋栗与莓果味道。

sentences.english: My skin texture has improved to feel soft and silky without any greasiness.
sentences.chinese: 我的皮肤纹理有改进，手感柔软，没有任何油腻柔滑。

sentences.english: He passed his hand down the horse's forelegs and stroked its sleek coat.
sentences.chinese: 他把手伸过马的前腿，抚摩它柔滑的皮毛。

sentences.english: Skin becomes smoother and fairer with regular use.
sentences.chinese: 经常使用，皮肤变得嫩白柔滑。

sentences.english: Processing with imported materials, design noble chic, cloth soft handfeel.
sentences.chinese: 进料加工，图案大气别致，布料手感柔滑。

sentences.english: Its color and luster is simple and kind, the texture is soft to slip, it look the whole kitchen more classic.
sentences.chinese: 它色泽淳厚，质感柔滑，令整体厨房看起来更经典。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
